text: The U.K. investigates its ex-ambassador to the U.S. over alleged leaks to Epstein - NPR

text: Bitcoin breaks below $73,000 to lowest since November 2024 as heavy selling resumes - CNBC

text: New Mexico warns against consuming raw milk after newborn dies from listeria - NBC News
fullText: Health officials in New Mexico are warning against consuming raw dairy products after a newborn baby in the state died from a listeria infection that they say was likely contracted when the baby's mother drank raw milk during pregnancy
